pages.text: The $(l:resources/stratine)Stratine Gem$() you set into this circlet, itself a creation of the Nether, can absorb high temperatures with ease.$(br)It even protects you from the blazing heat of Lava - if only for a short time, until it has had a chance to cool down again.$(br)Pair it with something that grants you Fire Resistance, you are able to swim in Lava almost as if it were Water.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: $(li)Prevents damage from fire and hot floors.$(li)When cooled down, grants you a short protection from lava
